learning_outcomes: Describe the basic skills in science
Use and care for apparatus and instruments in the laboratory
Use the SI units for basic and derived quantities in science
Appreciate consumer protection when handling different apparatus, instruments and other materials in day-to-day life
skills_to_assess: Ability to use and care for apparatus and instruments in the laboratory

learning_outcomes: Explain the relationship between an atom, an element, a molecule and a compound
Assign symbols to selected elements
Write word equations to represent reactions of selected elements to form compounds
Outline the applications of common elements in the society
Appreciate the information on packaging labels of commonly consumed substances
skills_to_assess: Ability to differentiate between elements and compounds

learning_outcomes: Explain the importance of conserving the environment
Describe various methods used in environmental conservation
Participate in conservation initiatives in the school or community
Demonstrate responsibility and commitment to environmental protection
skills_to_assess: Ability to apply environmental conservation practices
Ability to describe the importance of conserving the environment

learning_outcomes: Explain the concept and causes of friction
Identify the advantages and disadvantages of friction
Suggest ways of increasing or reducing friction in daily life
Appreciate the role of friction in everyday situations
skills_to_assess: Ability to describe the concept of friction and its effects
Ability to identify ways of reducing or increasing friction

learning_outcomes: Describe the structure and functions of parts of plant and animal cells
Differentiate between plant and animal cells
Appreciate the role of cells in living organisms
skills_to_assess: Ability to identify and describe parts of plant and animal cells

learning_outcomes: Outline the components of Integrated Science as a field of study
Explain the importance of science in daily life
Show interest in learning Integrated Science at junior school
skills_to_assess: Ability to explain the importance of science in daily life

learning_outcomes: Describe characteristics of physical and chemical changes
Differentiate between physical and chemical changes
Classify changes as either physical or chemical
Relate physical and chemical changes to day-to-day life
Appreciate the relevance of physical and chemical changes in day-to-day life
skills_to_assess: Ability to distinguish between physical and chemical changes

learning_outcomes: Identify parts of the human male and female reproductive systems
Describe functions of parts of the male and female reproductive system
Describe the physical changes that take place in boys and girls during adolescence
Develop a plan to manage developmental challenges during adolescence
Appreciate that physical changes in boys and girls during adolescence have social and reproductive implications
skills_to_assess: Ability to describe functions of parts of the male and female reproductive system
Ability to develop a plan to manage developmental challenges during adolescence

learning_outcomes: Identify various forms of energy
Describe how one form of energy can be transformed into another
Relate transformation of energy to real-life situations
Appreciate the importance of energy transformation in day-to-day life
skills_to_assess: Ability to describe transformation of energy and its application

learning_outcomes: Describe the structure and functions of parts of plant and animal cells
Differentiate between plant and animal cells
Appreciate the role of cells in living organisms
skills_to_assess: Ability to identify and describe parts of plant and animal cells

learning_outcomes: Outline the components of Integrated Science as a field of study
Explain the importance of science in daily life
Show interest in learning Integrated Science at junior school
skills_to_assess: Ability to explain the importance of science in daily life

learning_outcomes: Identify acids and bases using a litmus paper
Prepare an acid-base indicator from plant extracts
Describe the physical properties of acids and bases
Outline applications of acids, bases and indicators in real life
Appreciate the uses of acids and bases in real life
skills_to_assess: Ability to identify acids and bases
Ability to outline applications of acids and bases in real life

learning_outcomes: Identify and describe different types of pollution
Explain the causes and effects of pollution on human health and the environment
Suggest measures for pollution control and prevention
Show concern for pollution in the environment
skills_to_assess: Ability to describe different types of pollution and their causes
Ability to explain the effects of pollution on human health and the environment

learning_outcomes: Identify various forms of energy
Describe how one form of energy can be transformed into another
Relate transformation of energy to real-life situations
Appreciate the importance of energy transformation in day-to-day life
skills_to_assess: Ability to describe transformation of energy and its application

learning_outcomes: Describe the parts and functions of the human reproductive system
Explain the process of fertilisation and development of the embryo
Practise appropriate hygiene and care during puberty
Demonstrate responsible behaviour regarding sexuality
Appreciate the importance of reproductive health and responsibility
skills_to_assess: Ability to describe parts of the reproductive system and their functions

learning_outcomes: Identify common hazards and their symbols in the laboratory
Explain causes of common accidents in the laboratory
Demonstrate First Aid measures for common laboratory accidents
Appreciate the importance of safety in the laboratory and access to a healthy working environment

Match each class of fire with the appropriate fire extinguisher
Describe appropriate fire safety measures at home, school and workplace
Appreciate the importance of fire safety and preparedness
skills_to_assess: Ability to identify fire classes and use appropriate extinguishing methods

sub_strand: Movement of Materials In and Out of the Cell
learning_outcomes: Describe the processes of diffusion and osmosis
Demonstrate diffusion and osmosis using simple experiments
Relate diffusion and osmosis to movement of materials in living organisms
Appreciate the importance of diffusion and osmosis in living organisms
skills_to_assess: Ability to demonstrate and explain diffusion and osmosis
